comment: You can either set these values as environment variables or to a file called '.config.json' at the root of the repo
SSH_PUBLIC_KEY: ssh-rsa create an ssh public key using ssh-keygen
SSH-PUB-KEY: ssh-rsa create an ssh public key using ssh-keygen
VHDRESOURCEGROUP-NAME: Existing resource group with pre-created resources
VHDSTORAGEACCOUNT-NAME: Existing storage account with in the resource group
SPECIALIZED-WINVHD-URI: Specialized Windows VHD URI. This should be in same region as of deployments.
GENERALIZED-WINVHD-URI: Generalized Windows VHD URI. This should be in same region as of deployments.
DATAVHD-URI: Data disk VHD URI. This should be in same region as of deployments.
KEYVAULT-RESOURCE-ID: ARM resource id for key vault
KEYVAULT-SSL-SECRET-NAME: Secret name for SSL certificate in key vault
KEYVAULT-SSL-SECRET-URI: URI for SSL certificate secret in key vault
CUSTOM-FQDN-NAME: Fully qualified custom domain name, properly configured with CNAME mapping
CUSTOM-WEBAPP-NAME: First part of custom fqdn name
CUSTOM-DOMAIN-SSLCERT-PFXDATA: SSL certificate PFX data in base 64 encoded format
